name: Codename: Kids Next Door: Operation S.O.D.A.
name_original: Codename: Kids Next Door: Operation S.O.D.A.
description:
Codename: Kids Next Door: Operation S.O.D.A. is an action game.
You can play Codename: Kids Next Door: Operation S.O.D.A. on Game Boy Advance.
It was scored by Stephen Rucker and Thomas Chase Jones.
